author: @gurufocus
title: Bank Financials: Net Interest Margin Grows, Asset Quality Improves | BWFG Stock News
text:
A financial update reveals that the bank's first-quarter outcomes align with prior projections, showcasing a favorable trajectory. A key highlight is the expansion of the Net Interest Margin, which is on the rise even without additional rate reductions from the Federal Reserve.
Another significant development is the contribution of the bank's Small Business Administration (SBA) operations. This segment has started to enhance the financials, and the gain-on-sale income from SBA activities is anticipated to escalate throughout the year.
Additionally, the bank reported notable progress in asset quality. Through the effective resolution of two non-performing credits, the institution's non-performing asset ratio has decreased to 83 basis points. This marks a substantial enhancement in the institution's financial health.
Wall Street Analysts Forecast
Based on the one-year price targets offered by 1 analysts, the average target price for Bankwell Financial Group Inc (BWFG, Financial) is $40.00 with a high estimate of $40.00 and a low estimate of $40.00. The average target implies an
upside of 30.38%
from the current price of $30.68. More detailed estimate data can be found on the Bankwell Financial Group Inc (BWFG) Forecast page.
Based on the consensus recommendation from 1 brokerage firms, Bankwell Financial Group Inc's (BWFG, Financial) average brokerage recommendation is currently 2.0, indicating "Outperform" status. The rating scale ranges from 1 to 5, where 1 signifies Strong Buy, and 5 denotes Sell.
Based on GuruFocus estimates, the estimated GF Value for Bankwell Financial Group Inc (BWFG, Financial) in one year is $31.74, suggesting a
upside
of 3.46% from the current price of $30.68. GF Value is GuruFocus' estimate of the fair value that the stock should be traded at. It is calculated based on the historical multiples the stock has traded at previously, as well as past business growth and the future estimates of the business' performance. More detailed data can be found on the Bankwell Financial Group Inc (BWFG) Summary page.
